personal_info.name: Aarav Mehta
personal_info.address: Flat 302, Skyline Heights, Andheri West, Mumbai, India

summary: Results-driven software engineer with strong experience in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and AI-based automation. Skilled in designing scalable systems and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

work_experience.description: Designing and developing backend APIs using Python (FastAPI) and Node.js. Managing deployments on AWS and integrating CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Reduced API response time by 35% through query optimization
Implemented automated testing framework reducing bugs in production by 40%

work_experience.description: Assisted in building RESTful APIs and performed data cleaning for analytics pipelines.
achievements: Created reusable API templates that accelerated feature rollout by 20%

projects.title: AI Resume Analyzer
projects.description: Developed a Flask-based web app that uses NLP to match resumes with job descriptions using TF-IDF and cosine similarity.

projects.title: Smart Expense Tracker
projects.description: Built a mobile app that uses OCR and Firebase to automatically log and categorize expenses from receipts.
